title: U.K. Inquest Finds British Woman Was Killed ‘Unlawfully’ in Texas Shooting
summary_full: A British coroner ruled that a Texas man acted with gross negligence when he accidentally shot his 23-year-old daughter, who was visiting from Britain last year.
summary_public: A British coroner ruled that a Texas man acted with gross negligence when he accidentally shot his 23-year-old daughter, who was visiting from Britain last year.
